website_summaries.verdict: Owners say cats love the smell and taste of this wet food – even picky cats will happily eat it.
pros: Customers say cats like these cans so much it feels like they're being spoiled
Offers 24 cans in one box at a competitive price
cons: Smell of the wet food overwhelms some owners
Price for this canned food is higher than dry food

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Florentine cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this one and the chicken one. My problem with it is the spinach in it. Spinach constipates cats. To much of it will I wish this Company would get a clue and make the Florentine with carrots or pumpkin bits in it instead of spinach. I also noticed the meat part is like cut up pieces of rubber bands that's probably why the don't eat it. They always lick the gravy and leave the meat part behind. They won't eat pate type of cat food either. Purina please ditch the spinach for some of the Florentine flavors!!
customer_reviews.author: topcat

customer_reviews.title: Try a can from store first.
customer_reviews.text: My cat ate a little of the food and threw it up immediately. She refused to eat any more. I fed her the rest of the can later in the day to see what would happen and she refused to eat it. I now have 23 cans of food she won't eat. You may want to purchase a single can at the store before you purchase a case online to try it.
customer_reviews.author: elizadee

customer_reviews.title: The choice of the furry eating machines here....
customer_reviews.text: My cats being cats (and thus weird) have their preferences, and it turns out to be useless to feed them premium human-grade cat food. It's also difficult to get them to eat the cheaper pate type cat food too. *This* they'll scarf down and look for more. It seems to be good quality, and they're fairly agnostic about the flavour.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander McDonald

customer_reviews.title: 😸Let them eat cake ... Well sometimes..this is a better option..
customer_reviews.text: Mr picky kidney failure man gets what he wants.. And every 3 nights its this! He likes its chunky pate texture.. We cant find it in stores.. When he isnt eating this its florentine Collection.. We alternate flavors because.....he has a sophisticated palate...mmm...no...cuz hes nuts ...mmmm ...no cuz we're nuts.... Cuz he makes us nuts...if you have a kd cat.. YOU KNOW!!🐈🐈🐈🐈🐈
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed...
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been eating the Fancy Feast tuna primavera for a very long time but all of a sudden he has been getting sick (vomiting and diarrhea) after eating it. Coming on to Amazon, all I see are great reviews, but when I go on to Consumer Affairs, I see the mention of the same thing happening to other people's cats. Be cautious when purchasing this food now. It seems like something has changed and is making some cats sick.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Kitty's Gone Gourmet
customer_reviews.text: Jackson is 12 and unwilling to make the change to high-end, possibly more healthy, cat food. I originally started him on Fancy Feast gravy cat food, thinking it was the best at the time, but his interest has waned so I branched out with the Medleys and Gravy Lovers. He has medical issues and I have to give him pills--with these gravy-laden foods, I can mash them up with his meals and he is none the wiser. My doctor has a 19-year-old cat that will only eat Fancy Feast, so I am hoping that is a positive sign for my cat's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: greyeagle

customer_reviews.title: Different best by dates are no good
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 boxes of 24 cans of Tender Turkey Primavera. best by Aug 2021- long number ending in 1512. He stopped eating. I opened the next box with a best by Aug 2021-1505 he's eating again. Will you let me know what the problem was with those cans. The same thing happened with White meat Chicken Tuscany and Turkey Florentine. You can check my Amazon account and see that I order Fancy Feast on a regular basis and we have never had a problem. This concerns me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: hmh888

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves FFWMCP
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky cat. She's ten years old and and set in her ways and her tastes. This is the only kind of cat 🐈 food she will eat. I've spent a small fortune on other food. I've even tried mixing it with others but no, 15 lb Miss Tabitha will have none of them. She is stuck on FF White Meat Chicken Primevera w/garden veggies and sauce. Especially the sauce.... She loves the sauce. She licks her bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Periwinkle1940

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quantity offered. I recently switched my cat to an all-wet food diet (you should, too!) and my vet recommended to look up the chart on wet foods at catinfo.org. All the information you need is on there, and you may be surprised at how some "great" food brands aren't actually all that great when it comes to the protein-fat-carb ratio. Cats are obligate carnivores and don't require carbs at all, so if your cat is fat, it's probably because they eat dry food and/or get too many carbs. My cat Oliver LOVES this flavor above all others, and I am happy to be able to feed him something good for about $1/day.
customer_reviews.author: Virvada

customer_reviews.title: The only one my cat loves
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cat is a princess and will only eat fancy feast chicken florentine. This is a great price, much cheaper than big box pet supply stores. I'm baffled by reviewers who say they only got 12....I've ordered several times and have always gotten the full 24.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Did you say Chicken ?!?
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this stuff , we’ve tried other brands, even other Putin’s varieties of Chicken ..... NOTHING else will work for Peter .
customer_reviews.author: A. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the price keeps going up and up so we won't be buying again unless it goes back down!! Also the quality has been varied...I've gotten fresher cans with lots of gravy and cans that were so old practically had no gravy, what was left was more like paste texture. Luckily my cats like them fresh or old lol. Hopefully price will stop going up they can have again!!
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Not what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 24 cans of Chicken Florentine, Instead I got 2 12 packs of White meat collection medley. I am too annoyed to return it, I got what i wanted the first time I order this-the 24 cans of chicken florentine, but this time I did not get that. I doubt my cats will like the other flavors in this box, that's why I ordered 24 cans of chicken florentine-because I know that is their favorite. Really bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the Wild Salmon Florentine. I order all the time. Never had a problem. I was opening the new 24 case today and the cans in the case are Wild Salmon Tuscany, not Florentine! Too late to send back, it’s already opened. I’m very annoyed. The box is clearly labeled Wild Salmon Florentine. When I went back to look at my order in my order history, the picture is what I ordered, but the description says Chicken Tuscany. CHICKEN! I’m sure that’s not what it said when I placed my last order. All my previous orders were correct but going back and looking now, the description shows the Chicken Tuscany. What the heck Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Moonwillow

customer_reviews.title: Easier to buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaper and easier to buy on Amazon. Stinks like festering death, but the cats seem to like it. Overall, win. Buying this on Amazon as a 24-pack was much easier than going to the store and having to buy 24 loose cans or hunt down a very dusty 24-pack from the back of the shelf. I also would rather not buy cat supplies from a store that sells birds and reptiles like trinkets. Being trapped in a small glass container until being sold does not seem like a very good quality of life, and I don't really want to support it. I really appreciate being able to buy this online from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DG100

customer_reviews.title: My cats love and I love the price and ability to get a whole case of one flavor
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't love it but my cats sure do! I have one cat with kidney disease so getting her to eat as much canned food as possible is very important. She LOVES this particular flavor but I couldn't always find it at my local grocery stores and if I did there were usually just a few cans available. Thanks to Amazon I can buy an entire case of the flavor she likes best and I'm paying less than I'd pay at the store. It was also sent next day free of charge so we didn't have to go a day without it :)
customer_reviews.author: Ferretocious

customer_reviews.title: A REAL RIP-OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Fancy Feast Medleys Cat Food for years, and my cat loved it more than any other kind. All of a sudden, the quality has plummeted and the cost has gone up enormously. Now, it's more liquid than cat food, and they can't cover it up by adding more "Primavera" veggies. Now, it's so watery my cat throws it up. Not fair to increase the price AND decrease the quality.....one or the other, I can see, but BOTH? NOT ACCEPTABLE !
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Price Increase? Cats don't care, they want Fancy Feast!
customer_reviews.text: NOT a fan of the recent price increase on these, but my 2 spoiled brats are picky eaters, so 2 varieties of Fancy Feast - Primavera and Shredded chicken - are my go-to wet food for them. Occasionally we do go through phases where they'll turn their nose up at the food, but to me, that's less about the food and just feline whims. I even contacted the manufacturer to see if the recipe was changed, but no, still the same - and then a day or two later, after they stopped eating the Primavera and only ate the shredded chicken variety, both cats snapped out of it, and now like both kinds of foods again.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: MET WITH EXPECTATIONS OF ROYALTY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the cats loved the flavor and sound of the fancy feast can opening, and, the color and style of the can and styling of the can and photo of the Persian Cat, that they have learned to associate with 'special treat'! This product met the expectations of two cats of different personalities. One a pure white domestic medium hair, with a tuft of dark hairs on its head, golden beautiful egyptian eyes, as decendant of high royalty! The other also Royal Tortise-shell with large beautiful cow eyes of the richest greeny-golden hue! With this food satisfying Queens, it should meet with the expectations of other Kitties, Globally!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: What is in this?? 🤣🤣
customer_reviews.text: My kitties just love this!! Had previously gave them fancy feast ocean whitefish pate for kittens... which they ate right up. I tried this brand to give some variety.. now they won’t even touch the pate!! I have 2 cases... tried mixing it and they eat around it and leave the pate!! Guess I know what kind to get from now on. Anything in the Primavera blend is good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Shai M Laveau

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this 24 pack of Tuna Florentine, which was purchased in bulk with other cat food. Once I took a closer look at it, after all this time, I realized that it had been taped up instead of sealed together, as a 24 pack comes. Guess what was inside? It wasn't all Tuna Florentine, that's for sure. It was 9 tuna florentine, 6 ocean whitefish, 3 tuna feast in gravy, and 6 chicken and cheddar. What the heck, Amazon? Tuna Florentine is more expensive and I get the regular FAncy Feast, all kinds of mixture of flavors? I'm so confused. Time to call Amazon. I hope it's not too late.
customer_reviews.author: D.E. Culligan

customer_reviews.title: Picky Siamese approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siamese that would eat anything and everything you put in front of him, however my other (also Siamese) is the pickiest cat ever! She loves Fancy Feast and won't eat anything else! If this review has helped you in any way, please click the YES button. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BlueZebra

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky cats of any age!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats love this flavor! My older cat is 13+ yrs old, and my younger cat is 3+ yrs old. I usually feed them 4 or 5 times a day, and switch up the flavors during each feeding, but I use 1 can of this and split it between the both of them. They also eat other brands of dry kibble and treats throughout the day, but this is one of their fav wet foods. I would recommend this for picky cats, both of mine love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Angel K

customer_reviews.title: Mochi's favorite, doesn't smell bad and good value compared to walk-in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like regular food but not strong like a can of tuna. Our youngest "girl in a catsuit" loves it so much she wont readily eat anything else but treats. If she knows it's in the cupboard she'll meow until you follow to the kitchen where she will open and close (loudly) the cupboard door below the food while glancing at you and the food cupboard. At $.99 each can at the grocery store, the price on Amazon does offer savings unless you happen to get a coupon or grab them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.

customer_reviews.title: Salmony goodness with gravy
customer_reviews.text: Flavor? Well the two salmon “shreds” are only flavor our cats like so I suppose they consider it tasty. They would like extra gravy please. Scent? Better than boiling octopus or broccoli but not exactly a nosegay. We switched from blue buffalo wet because of one of our seniors allergies. She’s gone now but they really look forward to their fancy feast salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Kshoe1

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a bad batch, my cat dosen't like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves all Fancy Feast Salmon food. So we ordered this one as it was very cheap compared to the store price but this particular shipment looks like a bad batch. My cat doesnt even eat it, she smells it and run away. We split one can for a day. We tried two cans. Even we felt the smell and color of the food is not the same as we buy this particular one for a long time from the grocery store. Expiry date is still in 2022 but definitely it is not a good batch. I don't know we can return this cat food back as we already opened the package and used 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: My Kitties Say Thanks
customer_reviews.text: To be more precise, my cats give this 5 stars, LOL. They adore the Medleys but it's way too expensive at my local stores unless there is a buy one get one going on. Imagine my surprise when I found it here on Amazon for less than the usual Fancy Feast cases at my local stores! Now my kitties can get the Medleys on a more regular basis, rather than as a special treat. Meow, meow, meow -- translated: thank you very much! >^..^<
customer_reviews.author: Gail N.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I buy the same kind for him at the grocery store and he seems to love it. Not sure why he won't eat this ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat refuses to eat this. I have given him several cans and he just turns his nose up at it. I buy the same kind for him at the grocery store and he seems to love it. Not sure why he won't eat this unless it's a bad lot??
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: The Product is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the product, the only problem is they got bored with it after a few days, and I need to change it up with another one of your products. The size of your cans is just a bit small for my cats. If it was just a bit larger serving then they would not be back meowing at me wanting something else. I have one cat who has problems and cannot eat regular cat food and must have the moist cat food - Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: My finicky cat LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I do not taste it! I do not smell it! But I think Amazon sells it a little cheaper than my local stores. And free delivery is certainly convenient. My cat, who rules the roost around here, LOVES this chicken product. She has refused to eat several other kinds of canned cat food. I also get her the salmon, and the tuna, same brand. Chicken is her favorite, however. Because it has veggies it is also is probably healthier than pure meat.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Markee

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Says Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it. Usually only eats high end dry food, thought I would try this to add more moisture to his food. I do not mix it with his dry food, he eats it separately. Maybe not the best organic ingredients, but he will eat his. With all the dry vs wet, protein vs. high fiber, I have come up with Royal Canin hairball formula and Halo protein plus this hoping to keep him at his best. Tried the raw diet and that went over like a lead balloon.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Tarantolo

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat usually gobbles up Fancy Feast medleys, but she would not even take a bite of this. I'm not sure if it was a bad batch, but something is weird about this food. We'll stick to the salmon and poultry I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I think the Medleys variety are their favorite. The stainless steel bowls shine so much after ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always fed my cats Fancy Feast wet food and it's the only product I buy with the confidence of knowing that my cats won't reject them; however, I think the Medleys variety are their favorite. The stainless steel bowls shine so much after they finish eating their meal, I can see my face in them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the recipe?
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat it, but my cats love it. At least they used to. I'm not sure if they changed the recipe, because the texture does look different. It could also be they got tired of it. The Medleys collection is their favorite, and the food does look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Herby Beam

customer_reviews.title: Good price and cats like it
customer_reviews.text: After reading about the need for more water in our cats' diet on catinfo.org, and using their Goggle sheet, this was our first product tried as we move from dry to wet food. It met our criteria of <15% carbs, >50% protein, and the price is less than other brands. Our cats weren't quite sure at first but have decided they like this. Product has nice small chunks/flakes of tuna with a slight odor but as you'd expect from canned tuna. So far, I'd say this is a "winner" for our furry friends. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy & Nathan Sargent

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite food
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats who share one can morning and night. They are pretty spoiled. They are my best friends and my babies so I continue to purchase despite the price. They don’t really like any other. My only concern is does fancy feast still use unethically processed seafood from Thailand? (read a report about that)
customer_reviews.author: Intuit

customer_reviews.title: Great price, cats love
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this Tuna Tuscany. It has brown gravy and rice... Not the white gravy that's found in "delicate sauce". This was the best price I could find for the quantity, expiration date is in 2years, plenty of time. The price at my time of purchase was over $22, I now see how this item fluctuates in price often.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Unusual response from my animals kitty cats (4)
customer_reviews.text: Second time I got this for my cats the first time I just got them the toner that time I thought some of the assorted variety pack for some reason my cats Will not go in near This Specialty. They love all the grilled food And will even eat the classic. They love the dry food. I have four cats and they will not eat the melody lube.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to replace a fountain that we have had for more than ten years. This fountain is attractive and versatile; it has two different set-ups depending on your animals. The directions were straightforward and easy to follow. The flowered fountain attachment is attractive and our three cats began using it with no problems. My only suggestion for improvement would be to be able to see into the bowl in order to easily be able to tell when the water level is low.
customer_reviews.author: Potluck Queen

customer_reviews.title: They don't like it much
customer_reviews.text: Thought it might be healthier than the regular Fancy feast (my cat's regular food) sorry to say my kitties don't like these very much. They'll eat it but lots of left overs. But then again, cats don't like changes. I'm on the last 2 cans of the 24 cans and they still don't like it much and I mix it with their regular food
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you know which type you are ordering
customer_reviews.text: Please understand that this may be a very good product (and probably is) but my 3 indoor kitties love the Chicken Premivera and I did not catch that I was ordering Tuna so when all the cases arrived and I found I had misordered I decided to keep it but they just don't like it nearly as well as they have been several year on the Chicken....my bad.
customer_reviews.author: pray4you

customer_reviews.title: Fussy Ferrell Cat Gives It A Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant Medleys is unbelievable! I inherited a Ferrell cat thats a fussy eater. First can was gone in seconds she really enjoys her dinner! After reading the ingredients seems to me alot of thought and care was put into this product. She went from barely eating into she can't seem to get enough. Great work Purina! Thank You Amazon for stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: My cat really liked this food
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, "Bear", my 19 yr old cat passed away. He will be missed so much, brought a lot of happiness into our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Cat
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved it at first, then refused to eat it! These were pricey, so I wish she would not have changed her mind about not eating them - at least until more were gone! :) Probably plenty of other cats would love this product. The greens in it made me feel they were healthier.
customer_reviews.author: allegro

customer_reviews.title: My cat seems to like this one best
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the only Fancy Feast that my cat will eat consistently. He eats very little. I give him 1/3 can twice a day and he doesn't even finish that. He gets kibble overnight and that bowl is always empty in the morning so at least he's eating something. And I like that this Fancy Feast has bits of veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Grandavia

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably healthy and my cats prefer these new dark label flavors to the "greens with sauce/broth" types of FF. Plus the chewable bits are smaller than the Grilled with Gravy flavors of FF and easier for my smaller cat to eat. To the best of my knowledge this brand has not had the deadly contaminant problems of some other. And my cats refuse the more expensive and healthier brands. Usually a bit cheaper at local chain pet stores but sometimes ordering bulk with prime shipping is ever so more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: tb

customer_reviews.title: cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to say that this product arrived late and although the cans are fine, the entire package was soaked through and each can had to be wiped off with a paper towel. It appears that it happened when the box was packed since the cans were more wet than the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Achilli

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Wet Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: This canned food is a bit pricey but it's the only one my cat likes. In addition to white meat chicken, each can contains garden veggies and green in a classic sauce. She gets a half a can a day supplemented by dry food. I add about a teaspoon of water to the Fancy Feast so she gets some extra fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ibbotson

customer_reviews.title: 5 MEOWS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered/received on time-2 days later. Out the gate - my 2 cats loved it! They gobbled it up right away. I think they would marry it if they could. Very happy I purchased it for them. Will definitely put this on subscription. As cat owners, we always say....if they like it - we love it. Happy, Happy, Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Grant

customer_reviews.title: Received!
customer_reviews.text: One of cats favorite and only food she likes. It's been very difficult to get any where and I almost cancelled once I was told the delivery date would originally be on Dec. 3rd, well happy I did not cancel this order and happy it came a month earlier Oct. 16th. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like a good product
customer_reviews.text: My cat and the rest of the neighborhood strays seemed very pleased with this recipe. I should have bought two at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approves highly
customer_reviews.text: My man cat thinks really highly of this flavor. He's a big eater so i buy this by the case and rotate each meal's flavor. This looks like it's creamy and delicious and kitty scarfs it down. Worth the price for his happy tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the only cat food my spoiled little Ziva will eat. Put anything else in her dish and it lands on the floor for the dog. I won't ever test her but I feel she would starve before she would eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie D. Texas

customer_reviews.title: Loved by My Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats are going wild over these garden green cans, I though it was a strange gimmick to lead pet owners into believing that there are greens missing from their diet, but my cats REALLY LOVE THESE cans They (four) hear me open them and they are right at my feet waiting for goodies.
customer_reviews.author: KL Mackay

customer_reviews.title: ... had pitched to a cruel outside life) is doing better with this product than any other we have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little rescue cat (whom someone had pitched to a cruel outside life) is doing better with this product than any other we have tried her upon. She is older and missing a few teeth (one canine tooth, and perhaps a few others). It appears to settle well with her tummy and intestines; I think the greens help her digestive system. I do recommend it, and shall continue to purchase cases from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda M Graves

customer_reviews.title: If I try to feed my cats something else they just stare at me
customer_reviews.text: If I try to feed my cats something else they just stare at me. This particular flavor has lots of sauce. They used to eat the shredded chicken fare until they tasted this flavor. This and only this for months now, Cats are weird.
customer_reviews.author: seven12

customer_reviews.title: For my picky cat!
customer_reviews.text: He only eats this food and only this food. The price is the best deal you can find anywhere for the amount of cans you get. My cat is so picky it’s unreal. So finding this on a good deal is important. I’m glad I have the ease of being able to get it prime and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Charmane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change the recipe???
customer_reviews.text: My cat had absolutely loved this cat food. I could hardly spoon it out of the can because her nose would be in the way, My new order was delivered yesterday and now she won't touch it. I would attribute this to the vagaries of cats, except that , even with my inferior human senses, I can see that this food looks very different now. The chicken is MUCH darker. It no longer looks like white meat. And the sauce also looks thicker and darker. Now what do I do with the remaining 22 cans ? What have you done, Purina?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Starzenski

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Feline Food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the Medleys food. This is an all natural product with no added fillers. There is a choice of having the food in broth or sauce. Product smells like real food, especially the Chicken, Tuna and Salmon .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Koenig

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried these myself, but the experts say that the Wild Salmon Primavera are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I've got three Gravy lickin' cats, and this Wild Salmon Primavera is their favorite, explaining why I buy them 2 dozen at a time. They also like the Florentino version, but those are even harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Lip Licking Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE it! Both are finicky eaters and usually more into chicken. Within moments however, their bowls were empty, and both were satisfyingly licking their lips. One ran to the other's bowl checking for any extra, so the savory sauce must be enticing. Nice switch for now n' then. Try not to feed them TUNa too much as know from past experience it can cause health issues in male cats. The ONLY problem with it is, one of my cats now stands outside the refrigerator door making lamenting meows to let us know it smells like MORE; he's never done that before, usually very quiet. Would definitely purchase again though as a change of pace for them.
customer_reviews.author: KELLI

customer_reviews.title: My cat love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't know if I love it or not - I have never tasted it. But my Siamese cat thinks it is the most wonderful food ever. He would eat it nonstop if I let him. So, I love it because it makes him so happy. It is not something I give him exclusively, because of the price, but I give him a can of it each evening before bedtime, and he is a happy cat! I was happy to find a case of it at a competitive price through Amazon,
customer_reviews.author: ccsteveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why--but I don't think the quality is as good as retail
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for some time, and my cats no longer will eat it. I'm not sure why--but I don't think the quality is as good as retail. I did a test buying the same White Meat Chicken Primavera at Target and then offering it to them, and they at it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this bechamel sauce stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cat food. I’m not personally tasting it, but my crew loves it! I can put a can of this over some food they did not like, and they like this so much they eat the less palatable food without complaint.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Tuscany-Yummie!
customer_reviews.text: The Chicken Tuscany flavor of Fancy Feast is so hard to find. My "daughter" only seems to like the Chicken flavors the best. Fancy Feast Medleys is the only brand I buy. I'm mixing the Chicken Tuscany with a little Chicken Primavera and Shredded Chicken Fare. She loves it! Even though these are only 3oz cans, they are packed with a lot of food which looks good....carrots, greens/veggies, rice! As long as she likes it that's all that matters! Thanks for carrying this product, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTALEE

customer_reviews.title: Finicky female cat stopped liking after a while
customer_reviews.text: My male cat will eat just about anything, but my female cat is the real test. She liked it for a while, but then stopped liking it, so I deducted a star. She does entirely love other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Tammee

customer_reviews.title: Not the same  cat food.
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates this cat food. I've never had any issues with this brand but this shipping is horrible. my cat is refusing to eat. I had to go to petsmart to get different brand of cat food. I am not sure if Purina did add something extra but I dont think I will purchase Purina cat food again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Starr

customer_reviews.title: I think I ate too much!@
customer_reviews.text: It was good but I like the gravy more than the meat. My mom doesn't like that! 😹
customer_reviews.author: Techywoman

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it when it’s a good batch !
customer_reviews.text: with Fancy Feast it’s hit and miss. They sometimes have cases or cans of flavors my cat always eats and he won’t touch then. Amazon was kind enough to refund on cases he would not touch and the replacement cases were fine. Amazon has awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: this particular flavor and texture is the cats' meow
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old cat with kidney issues has decided this particular flavor and texture is the cats' meow. He's finally putting on a little weight. He liked a lot of the other Medley flavors, but this one rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Tammey

customer_reviews.title: CATS TREATS
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this food and we intersperse it with other foods, wet and dry, to assure complete nutrition. Even picky cats seem to like this, although every cat seems to have their own preferences. More costly doesn't necessarily mean they will eat it, as all cat lovers know!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Getting what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered Chicken Primavera based on the image shown. We received Tuscany style and we are not the only ones who experienced this ordering boondoggle. Hoping that this might get your attention
customer_reviews.author: David Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Cat's favorite wet food
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the Florentine wet canned foods, especially tuna, wild salmon and white meat chicken. The carton came in fine shape with no cans dented. My cat and I are very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Convenient purchase
customer_reviews.text: Convenient purchase These are priced nearly the same at the local Pet Supplies Plus. Ordering from Amazon was just more convenient than running to the store. The product is high quality, my cats (2) love it, they always know when dinner time is. :) What's more they are vet recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperjump

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Go Crazy For This!
customer_reviews.text: My furbabies love this and go crazy for it. I normally feed them Fancy Feast with extra gravy and they like that, but, when I serve the medleys they finish every scrap! Adding this to my shopping list permanently :)
customer_reviews.author: IvanaYvonne

customer_reviews.title: MMMmmm!
customer_reviews.text: We order these specifically for our very senior cat that has had problems with kidney stones off and on over the years. Fortunately, with products from your site, and with the help of a good doctor, of course, he is doing well and loving every bite of Medleys canned feast. He likes all the flavors, but the chicken seems to be his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes Hodo

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It and the Price Is Right!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats, like most cats, are very picky eaters. But the one food that they have always eaten are the Purina fancy feast medleys (so long as we do not feed them the pate’s). We can count on Purina fancy feast for them. And Amazon always seems to have it for a great price and with quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Doloboff

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: We buy our cat food exclusively through Amazon because it's much easier for us to have a box show up every month. We figured out the cost difference of buying it through here versus driving to the store, picking out the cans, and paying their price - no surprise that this is cheaper. Plus it allows us to continually provide Gimpy with a variety of food. We have our Subscribe & Save setup so that we rotate 24 packs of Elegant Medleys Florentine Collection, Primavera Collection, and Shredded Fare Collection using this Yellowfin Tuna and Shimp mixed in. My husband even goes so far as to sort and number the cans to ensure Gimpy gets a different flavor every day!
customer_reviews.author: Selanda

customer_reviews.title: stolen
customer_reviews.text: I have not received this package. It was not handed to me directly as stated in the USPS tracking system. I would like a full refund to the credit card used in the purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: QAE

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and smelling cat food.
customer_reviews.text: More importantly, my cats love it. It's not always easy to get a cat food that all four of them will eat, but the chicken pate' version of Fancy Feast medleys is one that they enjoy, even Miss Picky who rarely likes anything other than her dry food. The seafood versions aren't as popular, but they will eat them.
customer_reviews.author: neelaban

customer_reviews.title: Cats love urina Fancy Feast Medleys Adult Canned Wet Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my cats this food for two years now - particularly the "Wild Salmon Florentine" flavor. They never tire of it. I totally recommend the Florentine style food for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Sandrine

customer_reviews.title: Cats like this
customer_reviews.text: There is enough for 3 cats to share for a meal. I have no idea if it tastes good. Not gonna try it. Has just enough juice and a lot of meat. My ndoor cats like it.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Ruined
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the Fancy Feast Cat Food (Salmon with greens) from Amazon.com for years. In September, I ordered 8 cases and they came in 3 shipments. Three (3) of the CASES were ruined and I had to throw them away. I just opened another case and it's ruined too. It's the cans with the gold top but the cans with the blue top are fine. So disappointed as I won't be ordering thru Amazon.com anymore. I liked ordering thru them because I could have it delivered right to my door. The expiration date is not until next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Z.

customer_reviews.title: Our cats all love this cat food
customer_reviews.text: This is our standby cat food as we can be sure all 3 of our cats (one of whom is very picky) will eat it. We alternate with other cat food brands and flavors for variety.
customer_reviews.author: P M.

customer_reviews.title: Meow 😼
customer_reviews.text: My cats are jerks but they do eat this kind too. I like Fancy Feast too, because it seems like a better canned food than purina's friskies, which my cats won't eat, but my sister's cats will eat it 🤷‍♀️🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Rufffies

customer_reviews.title: Kitty licks her bowl clean!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several of the medleys varieties as my cat like greens. This flavor is her ABSOLUTE favorite. 24 cans last the same amount of days. I’m going to start charging this little diva rent 🙄
customer_reviews.author: E. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Cat upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this for several years. Lately this last purchase seems to be making my cat vomit. She does this immediately after eating. The date is 2020 so I know it is not out of date. Will not been buying for a while. I will try locally and see if it caused the upset stomach.
customer_reviews.author: marynell

customer_reviews.title: So much better price than grocery store, for excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: So far my cats wont eat it, and it's their go to normal flavor. Am worried about quality and conditions that its stored in..update, my cats were having a off day and are now loving it as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to buy online
customer_reviews.text: I took in a stray kitten who is very very picky about her food... really? Yep, she only likes this salmon & 2 other fancy feast flavors and...I have to rotate them! Picky picky
customer_reviews.author: E. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Only food Meep will eat.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't love it, but it's the only canned food Meep (my cat) will eat. He doesn't always eat every bit of it, but he only leaves some wood-looking slices. But he won't eat anything else, so this is it, and it's cheaper than driving to the pet food warehouse and cheaper, too.
customer_reviews.author: J R Compton

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Cat is older now and struggles with cuts. She loves this and it’s easier to mix her probiotic in. Gets a little firm if you keep in the fridge but a 10 second microwave fixes that. Cat seems to like clears her plate I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I think my cat loves the gravy as he laps it up first and then eats the chicken like food. I only use as a wet food supplement to dry kibble. 1/2 can a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E Field

customer_reviews.title: My cat gets excited every morning for it.
customer_reviews.text: I leave dry food out for my cat all the time so she never goes hungry but when i put down the fancy feast in the morning she literally cries out for it.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cats are happy
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars for flavor, but I haven't tasted it. My cats seem happy with it. Super convenient to order online instead of hauling from the pet store and bringing it home. As long as it stays same price as the store, I will continue to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: This is literally one of the only cat foods my cat will eat. He loves tuna. Definitely recommend this for the picky cats of the world.
customer_reviews.author: ada

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not at all picky, but this is her favorite flavor. She will gobble this right up. I’m glad I can get an entire case of just this flavor!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: A Kitten Favorite
customer_reviews.text: One of only 2 flavours my parents' cat will eat. He loves it. Always comes: fresh, and without dents or damage to the cans. Nice not to buy this in the store (which may not have the desired flavour).
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knaack

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it and beg for it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats love this food. They will stand by their bowls and meow even if the bowl is full of other food. I quit buying other flavors because this is the only one getting 5 Meowy stars.
customer_reviews.author: YaYato6

customer_reviews.title: Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described...this is the only flavor my cats like and I will continue to order from this company as long as they are selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My cats like this and they usually will only eat pate.
customer_reviews.text: Most of my cats will eat this even though they only like Fancy Feast pate. Price changes are the only thing that stops me from buying it on a consistent basis. Price fluctuates a lot. Not sure why. I got last order on Chewy. Wait and watch.
customer_reviews.author: TechConsumer

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Adult Canned Wet Cat Food - (24) 3 oz. Cans
product_meta.description: Size:(24) 3 oz. Cans| Style:In Savory Sauce| Color:Salmon TuscanyFeed your cat Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Wild Salmon Tuscany wet cat food to kick off mealtime in a savory way. Inspired by a classic Italian Tuscan recipe, this gourmet cat food combines real wild salmon, long grain rice and garden greens to create a delectable flavor that cats crave, and it provides 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats. The high-quality ingredients, vitamins and minerals included in every serving of Purina Fancy Feast Medleys give you peace of mind, knowing that you're serving your beloved feline friend a healthy, wholesome, responsibly sourced meal, and the amazing flavor of the food shows your cat just how much you love her. Pop the can open with the easy pull-tab to fill your cat's food dish with the mouthwatering combination of Wild Salmon Tuscany wet cat food each day or explore our entire menu to find out which of our palette-pleasing meals she likes best.
feature_bullets: Twenty-Four (24) 3 Oz. Can - Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Wild Salmon Tuscany With Long Grain Rice & Garden Greens Adult Wet Cat Food
Made With Real Wild Salmon, Long Grain Rice And Garden Greens That You Can See
Inspired By Classic Italian Tuscan Recipes
Provides 100% Complete And Balanced Nutrition For Adult Cats
Covered In A Savory Fish Broth That Cats Love

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
